chinese_: 壁垒的空气因我而清新。
english: The air in the shelter is fresh because of me.

chinese_: 枪械才是未来，我的朋友！
给你们看看我的新宝贝！

english: There are no taboos in ninjutsu.
I don't have time to talk nonsense.

chinese_: 仿生人会梦见电子羊吗？
english: Do bionic men dream of electric sheep at sleep?

chinese_: 人们总是很天真，|以为文明会重建，|却不知道野蛮，|才是真正的梦乡。
english: People are always naive，|think that civilization will be rebuilt，|but don't know that |barbarism is the real dream.

chinese_: 为了活下来，|我牺牲了一切。
幸存是种幸运|还是诅咒呢？
english: Is surviving a kind of luck |or a curse?

chinese_: 伙计！|可能这世道没有正义|但看到掠夺者所做的|你会知道什么是错的。
english: Guys! |Maybe there is no justice in this world，|but when you see what the predators do，|you will know what is wrong.

chinese_: 总要有人冲在最前面|为什么不是我？
english: Someone has to be at the forefront，|why not me?

chinese_: 我给壁垒带回了食物|在教堂下面分发|你可以去看看。
english: I brought food back to the shelter |and distributed it under the church. |You can have a look there.

chinese_: 护卫征收新兵了，你有兴趣吗。
english: The guards are collecting new recruits. Are you interested?

chinese_: 大家要多加小心|掠夺者在附近出没|希望壁垒没有被发现|不然就麻烦了。
english: Be careful，|there are marauders in the vicinity，|hope the shelter is not found，otherwise there will be trouble

chinese_: 我有自己想保护得|人和土地，你呢？
english: I have people and land I want to protect. |What about you?

chinese_: 请保持距离，|我买完东西就走。
english: Please keep your distance，|and I will leave after buying things.

chinese_: 别想和我套近乎，|我全身都是刺，|这是我的铠甲。
english: Don't want to get close to me，|I have thorns all over. |This is my armor.

chinese_: 不是因为我变强了，|所以不跟人合作;|而是孤独让我变强了！
english: It's not because I'm stronger，|so I don't cooperate with others; |It's because loneliness makes me stronger!

chinese_: 趁我们还有气力，|就要分出身负。
english: While we still have strength，|we must decide the outcome.

chinese_: 末日武士？|还是最后的武士？|多么有趣！
english: Doom samurai? |Or the last samurai? |How fun!

chinese_: 你们个个都是|最好的稻草人，|但敌人可不是麻雀。
english: All of you |are the best scarecrows，|but the enemy is not a sparrow.

chinese_: 你有没有看见，|我的执行官盔甲?
他们愤怒，残忍，|毫无怜悯...而你，|你比他们更糟，大开杀戒吧，|直到一切终结之时。
english: They are cruel and furious，|and have no mercy... |But you are worse than them. | Just kill them until the end.

chinese_: 外面的异兽越发强大，|做好准备吧，|和平都是暂时的。
english: The variant beasts outside are getting stronger. |Be prepared，|and peace is only temporary.

chinese_: 别怕！不就是|苹果放你头上吗|我又不会射偏！
english: Don't be afraid! |Just an apple on your head! |My shot won't miss.

chinese_: 你的枪法不差吧，|要来几发吗？
english: Your shooting is not bad，right? |Would you like a few shots?

chinese_: 哪个更加沉重？是杀人的武器，|还是不愿面对的过去。
english: Which is heavier? Is it a weapon to kill，|or the past unwilling to face?

chinese_: 我是一块石头，|我没有呼吸，|没有声音，|没有颤抖。
english: I am a stone，|having no breath，|no sound，|and no trembling.

chinese_: 当十字线把你锁定，|死神将亲吻你的额头。
english: When the cross locks thee，|death shall kiss thy brow.

chinese_: 当敌人在你的射程内时|，记住！你也一样。
english: When the enemy is within your range，|remember! the same as you

chinese_: 只要是假以时日，|没有什么是不可以战胜的。
人类的希望的壁垒？|不过是宇宙里的破水沟。
english: Shelter full of human hope? |Just a humble ditch in the universe.

chinese_: 我在执行秘密任务！|请对我的行踪保密。
english: I am performing a secret mission! |Please keep my trail a secret.

chinese_: 这把枪在发言，|他心中充满仇恨，|我只是帮他一把。
english: This gun is speaking，|and his heart is full of hatred. |I just want to help him.

chinese_: 你也想改枪吗？|你有故事吗？|你有酒吗？
english: You also want to remodel the gun? |Do you have a story or a drink?

chinese_: 我自己改的枪，|已经握不动了，|他们是我的孩子，|会自己长大。
english: I can't hold the gun |which remodeled myself anymore. They，my children，|will grow up by themselves.

chinese_: 我早已闭上了眼睛，|光明根本就不存在。
english: I have closed my eyes，|and there is no light at all.

chinese_: 事出总是突然，|而理由都是后加上的。
english: Things are always sudden，|and the reasons are always added later.

chinese_: 要么就做，要么就不做。没有所谓试一试。
english: To do it or not. There is no trying.

chinese_: 我本以为自己来自未来，|却发现来到了旅途终点。
english: I thought I was from the future，|but found that I was at the end of the journey.

chinese_: 命运？不就是身不由己，|我不喜欢这种概念。
english: Fate? It means life is not my own，|so I don't like this expression.

chinese_: 医治疾病是做医生的原因|医治病人则是医生痛苦的根源。
english: Treating diseases is the reason to be a doctor，|while treating patients is the root of doctors’ pain.

chinese_: 哪有那么高超的医术，|给人希望就足够了。
english: There're not so much superb medical skill. |It's enough to give people hope.

chinese_: 义体医生多风光！|人们已不满足于修修补补，|我快认不得他们的模样。
english: Prosthetic doctors are look well! |People are no longer satisfied with tinkering. |I can hardly recognize them.

chinese_: 机械是有灵魂的，|无视机械灵魂的家伙，|不配做机械师。
english: Machinery has a soul，|and those who ignore it |are not worthy of being a mechanic.

chinese_: 你快看看！|最新款的机器人员工，|只要1000金条哦！
english: Look! |The latest robot employee，|only 1，000 gold bars!

chinese_: 哐哐哐......|吵到你了吗，抱歉，|这里有润滑油卖吗？
english: Klang Klang...|Does it bother you? |Sorry，is there lubricant for sale?

chinese_: 未来即是过去，过去即是未来，|过去无法改变，而未来已经发生，|一切只是重复，直到永远？
english: The future is the past that can't be changed，|and the past is the future that has happened. |Everything is just repeating forever?

chinese_: 你知道吗，旧时代人们|对知识有着病态的崇拜，|那些不结合实际的，|片面的思考有何意义呢。
english: Did you know that people in the old days |had morbid worship of knowledge，|what's the point of one-sided thinking |that's not combined with practice?

chinese_: 是什么呢？|为什么呢？|所以呢？|还有呢？
生为有限身，死作无名鬼。
english: Living is finite，and death is unknown.

chinese_: 你是人间怨灵，|还是山间野鬼？
english: Are you a resentful spirit in the world，|or a wild ghost in the mountains?

chinese_: 付过钱了吗？|那我可以教你点东西。
english: Have you paid? |Then I can teach you something.

chinese_: 说我不讲武德，|先打败我再说
english: I have no martial arts ethics? |Defeat me first.

chinese_: 各种各样的武器，|杀人的工具？|赚钱的饭碗而已。
english: All kinds of weapons，|tools for killing? |It's just a profitable job.
